title: A cool walk and a hot bath
description:
Our story tonight is called "A cool walk and a hot a bath" and it’s a story about those particular days right on the edge of Autumn and Winter when the wind is changing and there are pleasures to be found in being outside and in being in. It’s also about saying hello to a friend, the joy of unwrapping a gift and watching the seasons change.

So get cozy and ready to sleep.

Order the book now! hyperurl.co/NothingMuchHappens

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
author: contact@nothingmuchhappens.com (Curiouscast)
